ygData.subject: How Lullaby used to be. (Results on how it is now)
ygData.msgSnippet: John, Perhaps you could borrow a Staff of Writhing and a Groteque Mask from a friend to lower your CHR even more.  Not certain what else out there lowers CHR.
ygData.messageBody:
John,

Perhaps you could borrow a Staff of Writhing and a Groteque Mask from a
friend to lower your CHR even more. Not certain what else out there lowers
CHR.

Galtin of E'ci

> You got slightly fewer secondary resists than me (163/415 =
> 39.3% with lute). This would support the theory that they
> have a sign error in the charisma bonus for secondary resists,
> as my charisma was 154 vs your 133. I'll have to test it
> again tonight - I'll try to get to BB and get a skunk to spray
> me, if they can still affect me at all.
>
>
